00194        template <int SecondWidth>
00195        void GetMultiplied(const TMatrix<SecondWidth, Width, Element>& matrix, TMatrix<SecondWidth, Height, Element>& result) const
00196        {
00197               for (int resultY = 0; resultY < Height; ++resultY){
00198                      for (int resultX = 0; resultX < SecondWidth; ++resultX){
00199                             double sum = 0;
00200                             for (int i = 0; i < Width; ++i){
00201                                    sum += m_elements[i][resultY] * matrix.m_elements[resultX][i];
00202                             }
00203 
00204                             result.m_elements[resultX][resultY] = sum;
00205                      }
00206               }
00207        }

00417 
00418 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00419 TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::TMatrix(MatrixInitMode mode)
00420 {
00421        switch (mode){
00422        case MIM_ZERO:
00423               for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00424                      for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00425                             m_elements[x][y] = 0;
00426                      }
00427               }
00428               break;
00429 
00430        case MIM_ONES:
00431               for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00432                      for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00433                             m_elements[x][y] = 1;
00434                      }
00435               }
00436               break;
00437 
00438        case MIM_IDENTITY:
00439               for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00440                      for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00441                             if (x == y){
00442                                    m_elements[x][y] = 1;
00443                             }
00444                             else{
00445                                    m_elements[x][y] = 0;
00446                             }
00447                      }
00448               }
00449               break;
00450 
00451        case MIM_UPPER_TRIANGLE:
00452               for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00453                      for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00454                             if (x <= y){
00455                                    m_elements[x][y] = 1;
00456                             }
00457                             else{
00458                                    m_elements[x][y] = 0;
00459                             }
00460                      }
00461               }
00462               break;
00463 
00464        case MIM_DOWNER_TRIANGLE:
00465               for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00466                      for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00467                             if (x >= y){
00468                                    m_elements[x][y] = 1;
00469                             }
00470                             else{
00471                                    m_elements[x][y] = 0;
00472                             }
00473                      }
00474               }
00475               break;
00476        }
00477 }

00480 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00481 TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::TMatrix(const TMatrix& matrix)
00482 {
00483        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00484               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00485                      m_elements[x][y] = matrix.m_elements[x][y];
00486               }
00487        }
00488 }

00495 {

00497               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){

00500        }

00549 int TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetSize(int dimension) const
00550 {
00551        switch (dimension){

00555        case 1:
00556               return Height;
00557 
00558        default:
00559               return 0;
00560        }

00570 
00571        case 1:
00572               return (size == Height);
00573 
00574        default:
00575               return false;

00622 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00623 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::InitToIdentity()
00624 {
00625        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00626               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00627                      if (x != y){
00628                             m_elements[x][y] = 0;
00629                      }
00630                      else{
00631                             m_elements[x][y] = 1;
00632                      }
00633               }
00634        }
00635 }

00637 
00638 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00639 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetMaxElement() const
00640 {
00641        double retVal = m_elements[0][0];
00642 
00643        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00644               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00645                      double value = m_elements[x][y];
00646 
00647                      if (value > retVal){
00648                             retVal = value;
00649                      }
00650               }
00651        }
00652 
00653        return retVal;
00654 }
00655 
00656 
00657 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00658 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetMinElement() const
00659 {
00660        double retVal = m_elements[0][0];
00661 
00662        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00663               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00664                      double value = m_elements[x][y];
00665 
00666                      if (value < retVal){
00667                             retVal = value;
00668                      }
00669               }
00670        }
00671 
00672        return retVal;
00673 }

00676 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00677 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetNegated(TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result)
00678 {
00679        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00680               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00681                      result.m_elements[x][y] = -m_elements[x][y];
00682               }
00683        }
00684 }

00686 
00687 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00688 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetAdded(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix, TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result) const
00689 {
00690        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00691               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00692                      result.m_elements[x][y] = m_elements[x][y] + matrix.m_elements[x][y];
00693               }
00694        }
00695 }
00696 
00697 
00698 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00699 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetSubstracted(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix, TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result) const
00700 {
00701        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00702               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00703                      result.m_elements[x][y] = m_elements[x][y] - matrix.m_elements[x][y];
00704               }
00705        }
00706 }
00707 
00708 
00709 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00710 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetMultiplied(const TVector<Width, Element>& vector, TVector<Height, Element>& result) const
00711 {
00712        for (int resultY = 0; resultY < Height; ++resultY){
00713               double sum = 0;
00714               for (int i = 0; i < Width; ++i){
00715                      sum += m_elements[i][resultY] * vector[i];
00716               }
00717 
00718               result[resultY] = sum;
00719        }
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00723 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00724 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetScaled(double value, TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result) const
00725 {
00726        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00727               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00728                      result.m_elements[x][y] = m_elements[x][y] * value;
00729               }
00730        }
00731 }

00733 
00734 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00735 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetTransposed(TMatrix<Height, Width, Element>& result) const
00736 {
00737        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00738               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00739                      result.m_elements[y][x] = m_elements[x][y];
00740               }
00741        }
00742 }
00743 
00744 
00745 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00746 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetFrobeniusNorm2() const
00747 {
00748        double retVal = 0.0;
00749 
00750        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00751               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00752                      double value = m_elements[x][y];
00753                      retVal += double(value * value);
00754               }
00755        }
00756        return retVal;
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00761 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetFrobeniusNorm() const
00762 {
00763        return qSqrt(GetFrobeniusNorm2());
00764 }

00767 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00768 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetColumnVector(int columnIndex, TVector<Height, Element>& result)
00769 {
00770        I_ASSERT(columnIndex < Width);
00771        I_ASSERT(columnIndex >= 0);
00772 
00773        for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00774               result[y] = m_elements[columnIndex][y];
00775        }
00776 }
00777 
00778 
00779 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00780 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::SetColumnVector(int columnIndex, const TVector<Height, Element>& columnVector)
00781 {
00782        I_ASSERT(columnIndex < Width);
00783        I_ASSERT(columnIndex >= 0);
00784 
00785        for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00786               m_elements[columnIndex][y] = columnVector[y];
00787        }
00788 }
00789 
00790 
00791 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00792 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetRowVector(int rowIndex, TVector<Width, Element>& result)
00793 {
00794        I_ASSERT(rowIndex < Height);
00795 
00796        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00797               result[rowIndex] = m_elements[x][rowIndex];
00798        }
00799 }

00801 
00802 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00803 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetTriangleDecomposed(
00804                      TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result,
00805                      TMatrix<Height, Height, Element>* matrixQPtr,
00806                      int maxColumns,
00807                      double minHhNorm) const
00808 {
00809        if (&result != this){
00810               result = *this;
00811        }
00812 
00813        int columnsCount = qMin(Height - 1, Width);
00814        if ((maxColumns >= 0) && (maxColumns < columnsCount)){
00815               columnsCount = maxColumns;
00816        }
00817 
00818        for (int hhIndex = 0; hhIndex < columnsCount; ++hhIndex){
00819               double hhNorm2 = 0;
00820               for (istd::CIndex2d normIndex(hhIndex, hhIndex); normIndex[1] < Height; ++normIndex[1]){
00821                      double element = result.GetAt(normIndex);
00822 
00823                      hhNorm2 += element * element;
00824               }
00825 
00826               if (hhNorm2 < minHhNorm){
00827                      return false;
00828               }
00829 
00830               double element0 = result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, hhIndex)];
00831 
00832               double hhLength = (element0 >= 0)? qSqrt(hhNorm2): -sqrt(hhNorm2);    // destination diagonal value of current processed column, sign is choosen optimal for maximal householder vector length
00833 
00834               double hhVector0 = element0 + hhLength;   // element 0 of householder vector, rest of ist will be taken directly from matrix elements
00835               double hhVectorNorm2 = hhNorm2 + hhVector0 * hhVector0 - element0 * element0;       // sqare of norm of householder vector, first element replaced from original column norm sqare
00836 
00837               // correct next columns
00838               istd::CIndex2d matrixIndex;
00839               for (matrixIndex[0] = hhIndex + 1; matrixIndex[0] < Width; ++matrixIndex[0]){
00840                      matrixIndex[1] = hhIndex;
00841                      double dotProduct = result[matrixIndex] * hhVector0;
00842                      for (matrixIndex[1]++; matrixIndex[1] < Height; ++matrixIndex[1]){
00843                             dotProduct += result.GetAt(matrixIndex) * result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrixIndex[1]));
00844                      }
00845 
00846                      double reflexionFactor = 2 * dotProduct / hhVectorNorm2;
00847                      matrixIndex[1] = hhIndex;
00848                      result[matrixIndex] -= hhVector0 * reflexionFactor;
00849                      for (matrixIndex[1]++; matrixIndex[1] < Height; ++matrixIndex[1]){
00850                             result.GetAtRef(matrixIndex) -= result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrixIndex[1])] * reflexionFactor;
00851                      }
00852               }
00853 
00854               // correct optional matrix
00855               if (matrixQPtr != NULL){
00856                      istd::CIndex2d matrix2Index;
00857                      for (matrix2Index[0] = 0; matrix2Index[0] < Height; ++matrix2Index[0]){
00858                             matrix2Index[1] = hhIndex;
00859                             double dotProduct = matrixQPtr->GetAt(matrix2Index) * hhVector0;
00860                             for (++matrix2Index[1]; matrix2Index[1] < Height; ++matrix2Index[1]){
00861                                    dotProduct += matrixQPtr->GetAt(matrix2Index) * result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrix2Index[1])];
00862                             }
00863 
00864                             double reflexionFactor = 2 * dotProduct / hhVectorNorm2;
00865                             matrix2Index[1] = hhIndex;
00866                             matrixQPtr->GetAtRef(matrix2Index) -= hhVector0 * reflexionFactor;
00867                             for (matrix2Index[1]++; matrix2Index[1] < Height; ++matrix2Index[1]){
00868                                    matrixQPtr->GetAtRef(matrix2Index) -= result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrix2Index[1])) * reflexionFactor;
00869                             }
00870                      }
00871               }
00872 
00873               // correct current column
00874               result.SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, hhIndex), -hhLength);
00875               for (int i = hhIndex + 1; i < Height; ++i){
00876                      result.SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, i), 0);
00877               }
00878        }
00879 
00880        return true;
00881 }
00882 
00883 
00884 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00885 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00886 {
00887        bool retVal = true;
00888 
00889        static iser::CArchiveTag sizeTag("Size", "Size of matrix");
00890        static iser::CArchiveTag cellsTag("Cells", "Values of matrix cells");
00891 
00892        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(sizeTag);
00893        if (archive.IsStoring()){
00894               int width = Width;
00895               int height = Height;
00896 
00897               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(width);
00898               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(height);
00899        }
00900        else{
00901               int width = 0;
00902               int height = 0;
00903 
00904               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(width);
00905               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(height);
00906 
00907               if (!retVal || (width != Width) || (height != Height)){
00908                      return false;
00909               }
00910        }
00911 
00912        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(sizeTag);
00913 
00914        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(cellsTag);
00915        for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00916               for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00917                      retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_elements[x][y]);
00918               }
00919        }
00920        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(cellsTag);
00921 
00922        return retVal;
00923 }
00924 
00925 
00926 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00927 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator==(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix) const
00928 {
00929        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00930               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00931                      if (m_elements[x][y] != matrix.m_elements[x][y]){
00932                             return false;
00933                      }
00934               }
00935        }
00936 
00937        return true;
00938 }
00939 
00940 
00941 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00942 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator!=(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix) const
00943 {
00944        for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
00945               for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
00946                      if (m_elements[x][y] != matrix.m_elements[x][y]){
00947                             return true;
00948                      }
00949               }
00950        }
00951 
00952        return false;
00953 }
00954 
00955 
00956 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00957 const typename TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::ElementType& TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator[](const IndexType& index) const
00958 {
00959        return m_elements[index[0]][index[1]];
00960 }
00961 
00962 
00963 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
00964 typename TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::ElementType& TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator[](const IndexType& index)
00965 {
00966        return m_elements[index[0]][index[1]];
00967 }

00970 } // namespace imath
